item.title: Lisa add a quote by Anna Quindlen
item.description: "I would be most content if my children grew up to be the kind of people who think decorating consists mostly of building enough bookshelves." -- Anna Quindlen

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Wilt Chamberlain
item.description: "Everything is habit forming, so make sure what you do is what you want to be doing." -- Wilt Chamberlain

item.title: Lisa add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "We have no more right to consume happiness without producing it than to consume wealth without producing it." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "You wander from room to room Hunting for the diamond necklace That is already around your neck!" -- Rumi

item.title: Lisa add a quote by thomas fuller
item.description: "If it were not for hopes, the heart would break." -- thomas fuller

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Sell your cleverness and buy bewilderment." -- Rumi

item.title: Lisa add a quote by C. JoyBell C.
item.description: "We can't be afraid of change. You may feel very secure in the pond that you are in, but if you never venture out of it, you will never know that there is such a thing as an ocean, a sea. Holding onto something that is good for you now, may be the very reason why you don't have something better." -- C. JoyBell C.
